__e: And he told me the reason that they were so upset was because they know how special I was, and that I can do whatever I wanted in life if I was just willing to work for it.
Okay, he ran into her at a party two months ago, then sent me a ten-page e-mail about what she meant when she said, "I'll see you soon."
- When I was old enough to understand Sam explained what happened, and that I'd be the one to send you home.
The revolution, he explained, wasn't merely a war for the future of our country.
After she gives him a blanket she happens to be carrying... he explains to her that he's a time traveler.
But an angel also came to him and told him everything.
He was sad, but I explained that he was ready to be on his own.
I laid out the whole thing for him, and at first he said no.
Yes, and when he appeared in court the judge spoke to him.
Because, explained this very serious little boy, when you go to sleep, people come and steal your body.
But he told us that there was only one God and that if we didn't live in God's love, we would burn in Hell until the end of time.
And then, all at once, she screamed the words back at me until I got her to stop.
I explained that at some point I'd loved each one of them But I hadn't told them for fear of ruining my life
But then I explained about the boys we have, she understood.
And I said my goal wasn't to try to stir the pot.
Well, you just heard me tell this fella I'm the new sheriff of Red Rock, right?
Even though I had explained it was just some writing.
